name: DunFire Demo (Departed Paths)
description:
Time to be the ninja wizard you always wanted to be. Throw spells at your enemies as you zoom by. With hand tracking and gesture controls. You are the ninja wizard casting spells with hand signs as you duck and defend yourself to victory. Raining destruction upon everything in your path.

Demo Features:

  • 2 spells to cast
  • 2 enemy types
  • 1 level + tutorial

Features to arrive with full release:

  • 3 spells to cast
  • 8 vastly different levels
  • 11 enemy types
  • 15+ items to unlock and play with
  • Leaderboards 
  • Challenges
  • Better performance for quest 1
